Sentencas: The need for the new materials and advanced manufacturing techniques for achieving the highest characteristics of energy devices is an obvious trend.
Titulo: Fabrication of hierarchical lattice structures from zirconia stabilized ceramics by micro-SLA 3D printing approach

Sentencas: One of the possible ways to create structures for energy applications is to introduce complex geometries and promising features with additive manufacturing (AM).
Titulo: Fabrication of hierarchical lattice structures from zirconia stabilized ceramics by micro-SLA 3D printing approach

Sentencas: Using this approach, it is possible to create complex geometry and moreover decrease the weight of materials.
Titulo: Fabrication of hierarchical lattice structures from zirconia stabilized ceramics by micro-SLA 3D printing approach

Sentencas: In this paper, we developed the layer-by-layer fabrication approach of ceramic hierarchical lattice structures via the (micro-SLA) technology.
Titulo: Fabrication of hierarchical lattice structures from zirconia stabilized ceramics by micro-SLA 3D printing approach

Sentencas: As a feedstock material, the novel composition of partly stabilized-zirconia ceramics (6ScSZ, 8YSZ) was developed.
Titulo: Fabrication of hierarchical lattice structures from zirconia stabilized ceramics by micro-SLA 3D printing approach

Sentencas: Materials were selected as a solid slurry component due to high ionic conductivity at the working temperature of modern solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).

Sentencas: For the sintering, the green body heat treatment process was optimized to one step, which decrease the time and production cost.
Titulo: Fabrication of hierarchical lattice structures from zirconia stabilized ceramics by micro-SLA 3D printing approach

Sentencas: The data from scanning electron microscopy and micro-CT shows that 112-layer samples of the octet truss did not show any critical defects, and the achieved relative density was close to the theoretical one.
Titulo: Fabrication of hierarchical lattice structures from zirconia stabilized ceramics by micro-SLA 3D printing approach

Sentencas: Totally, 22 samples with the total size of 6.5 mm * 6.5 mm * 2.8 mm and the diameter of struts in the range of 240-250 mu m were fabricated at a rate of only 56 min per sample, using two modifications of advanced doped zirconia-ceramics.
Titulo: Fabrication of hierarchical lattice structures from zirconia stabilized ceramics by micro-SLA 3D printing approach

Sentencas: This study opens new opportunities for the development and transfer to the production of additive manufacturing of ceramics to build energy systems devices such as solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Fabrication of hierarchical lattice structures from zirconia stabilized ceramics by micro-SLA 3D printing approach
